about_the_game:
Accelerate and feel the high-speed thrill of British inter-city travel in Train Sim World 4! Express services await on the iconic East Coast Main Line, hurry between Peterborough and Doncaster, and through the English countryside, in sleek and flashy traction.

Zooming into Train Sim World is the iconic Intercity Express Train; climb aboard the state-of-the-art BR Class 801 and work at speed along the racetrack-like East Coast Main Line. Embark on LNER’s premier Azuma services with various stopping patterns, from non-stop runs to whistle stop tours through 4 counties of the Midlands: Cambridgeshire, Lincolnshire, Nottinghamshire, and South Yorkshire.

Unstoppable action continues with a flavour of freight, power up the staple BR Class 66 and haul the produce of modern industry with container flats in-tow. Keeping up with timings, an essential effort, to prevent holding up Azuma adventurers or Midlander commuters.

Manoeuvre through the Midlands, learn the art of precision and get know this famous main line like the back of your hand, from the record renowned Stoke Bank to the unique Newark Flat Crossing, rely on signals and wit to guide your journey. Trains with hundreds of passengers and tons of freight on-board are yours to control.

Awaken your inner desire for speed and race across Midlands County borders in Train Sim World: East Coast Main Line: Peterborough - Doncaster!

Key Features


  • 80-mile section of the East Coast Main Line between Peterborough and Doncaster, as it is today
  • LNER BR Class 801 Azuma EMU
  • EWS BR Class 66 diesel locomotive & FKA freight container wagons
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • A variety of Scenarios and an authentic Timetable
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 7.7 GB
